gw.plugin.integration

Class EventFiredMessageUtil

  • gw.plugin.integration.EventFiredMessageUtil
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class EventFiredMessageUtil
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    Allows for the creation of unique app-specific messages. The default configuration is for all apps to create the same basic message.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void createRejectChangeMessage(MessageContext messageContext, String app)
      static void createRemoveMessage(MessageContext messageContext, String app)
      When we receive notification of a "remove" message, it is possible that the remove is actually a consequence of merging two contacts together or from a rejection of a PendingContactCreate. We need to distinguish between a merge action, a PendingContactCreateRejection and a normal remove action.
      static void createUpdateMessage(MessageContext messageContext, String app, block():XmlBackedInstance getUpdateXml)
      When we receive notification of an "update" message, it is possible that the update is actually a consequence of merging two contacts together or a PendingContactUpdate which has been approved. We need to distinguish between a merge action, an approved PendingContactUpdate and a normal update action.

      • Methods inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
